content: click here for the pattern as a pdf from royal yarns 1 also available from michaels com on the wayback machine 2 **pattern notes ** pattern for both a cardigan and hat are given difficulty level is 1 out of 5 or easy patterns are free and do not require registration **size note ** pattern is given in 4 sizes for cardigan to fit chest 17 18 19 & 20 3 for hat circumference 12 14 16 **yarn requirements ** the cardigan calls for 3 3 25 3 5 4 ounces of the main color and 1 5 2 2 25 2 5 ounces of the contrast color yarn the hat calls for 1 25 1 5 1 75 ounces mc and 1 1 25 1 75 ounces of cc 1 http //www royalyarns com/fp/tlc-ccht/tlc-lw1328 pdf 2 https //web archive org/web/20070802181251/http //www michaels com/art/online/projectsheet pid=m23227
